title: Flynn Takes the Fifth as Russia Probes Continue (Audio)
itunes:title: Flynn Takes the Fifth as Russia Probes Continue (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Timothy Edgar, a fellow at the Watson Institute, discusses why former national security adviser Michael Flynn has decided to take the Fifth Amendment and is refusing to cooperate with the Senate Intelligence Committee's investigation into Russian interference in the U.S. election. He speaks with Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
